history.proof: intros a b IncA IncB. unfold increasing. intros n n' Hjoin. unfold increasing in IncA. unfold increasing in IncB. destruct n as [na nb]. destruct n' as [n'a n'b]. sfirstorder depth: 3. qsimpl time: 1.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type B : Type R_A : Relation A R_B : Relation B Join_A : Join A Join_B : Join B a : A b : B IncA : forall n n' : A, join a n n' -> Krelation n n' IncB : forall n n' : B, join b n n' -> Krelation n n' na : A nb : B n'a : A n'b : B Hjoin : join (a, b) (na, nb) (n'a, n'b) a0 : A b0 : B Unable to unify "Krelation na n'a" with "Krelation (na, nb) (a0, b0)".

In environment A : Type B : Type R_A : Relation A R_B : Relation B Join_A : Join A Join_B : Join B a : A b : B IncA : forall n n' : A, join a n n' -> Krelation n n' IncB : forall n n' : B, join b n n' -> Krelation n n' na : A nb : B n'a : A n'b : B a0 : A b0 : B H : join a na n'a H0 : join b nb n'b Unable to unify "Krelation nb n'b" with "Krelation (na, nb) (a0, b0)".

original: intros a b IncA IncB. unfold increasing. intros n n' Hjoin. unfold increasing in IncA. unfold increasing in IncB. destruct n as [na nb]. destruct n' as [n'a n'b]. apply prod_ind. - intros. apply (IncA na n'a). * auto. - intros. apply (IncB nb n'b). * auto.
